verses.verse: But <S%H347>Job<s%> <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%>,
Oh <S%H3863>that<s%> my <S%H3708>grief<s%> were <S%H8254>throughly<s%> <S%H8254>weighed<s%>, and my <S%H1942>calamity<s%> <S%H5375>laid<s%> in the <S%H3976>balances<s%> <S%H3162>together<s%>!
For now it would be <S%H3513>heavier<s%> than the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea<s%>: therefore my <S%H1697>words<s%> are swallowed <S%H3886>up<s%>.

For the <S%H2671>arrows<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> are <S%H5978>inside<s%> <S%H2534>me<s%>, the poison is drunk <S%H8354>up<s%> by my <S%H7307>spirit<s%>: the <S%H1161>terrors<s%> of <S%H433>God<s%> do set themselves in array against <S%H6186>me<s%>.
Does the wild <S%H6501>donkey<s%> <S%H5101>bray<s%> when he has <S%H1877>grass<s%>? or <S%H1600>lows<s%> the <S%H7794>ox<s%> over his <S%H1098>fodder<s%>?
Can that which is <S%H8602>unsavoury<s%> be <S%H398>eaten<s%> without <S%H4417>salt<s%>? or is <S%H3426>there<s%> any <S%H2940>taste<s%> in the <S%H7388>white<s%> of an <S%H2495>egg<s%>?
The things that my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H5060>touch<s%> are as my <S%H1741>sorrowful<s%> <S%H3899>food<s%>.
Oh that I might <S%H935>have<s%> my <S%H7596>request<s%>; and that <S%H433>God<s%> would <S%H5414>grant<s%> me the thing that I long <S%H8615>for<s%>!
Even that it would <S%H2974>please<s%> <S%H433>God<s%> to <S%H1792>destroy<s%> <S%H5425>me<s%>; that he would let loose his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and cut me <S%H1214>off<s%>!

Then should I yet have <S%H5165>comfort<s%>; <S%H5539>Yes<s%>, I would harden myself in <S%H2427>sorrow<s%>: let him not <S%H2550>spare<s%>; for I have not <S%H3582>concealed<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%>.
What is my <S%H3581>strength<s%>, that I should <S%H3176>hope<s%>? and what is my <S%H7093>end<s%>, that I should <S%H748>prolong<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%>?
Is my <S%H3581>strength<s%> the <S%H3581>strength<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%>? or is my <S%H1320>flesh<s%> of <S%H5153>brass<s%>?
Is not my <S%H5833>help<s%> in <S%H8454>me<s%>? and is wisdom driven quite from <S%H5080>me<s%>?
To him that is <S%H4523>afflicted<s%> <S%H2617>pity<s%> should be showed from his <S%H7453>friend<s%>; but he <S%H5800>forsakes<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%>.
My <S%H251>brothers<s%> have dealt <S%H898>deceitfully<s%> as a <S%H5158>brook<s%>, and as the <S%H650>stream<s%> of <S%H5158>brooks<s%> they pass <S%H5674>away<s%>;
Which are <S%H6937>blackish<s%> by reason of the <S%H7140>ice<s%>, and where the <S%H7950>snow<s%> is <S%H5956>hid<s%>:
At the <S%H6256>time<s%> they wax <S%H2215>warm<s%>, they <S%H6789>vanish<s%>: when it is <S%H2527>hot<s%>, they are consumed <S%H1846>out<s%> of their <S%H4725>place<s%>.
The <S%H734>paths<s%> of their <S%H1870>way<s%> are turned <S%H3943>aside<s%>; they <S%H5927>go<s%> to <S%H8414>nothing<s%>, and <S%H6>perish<s%>.
The <S%H734>troops<s%> of <S%H8485>Tema<s%> <S%H5027>looked<s%>, the <S%H1979>companies<s%> of <S%H7614>Sheba<s%> waited for <S%H6960>them<s%>.
They were <S%H954>confounded<s%> because they had <S%H982>hoped<s%>; they <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H2659>there<s%>, and were ashamed.
For now you are <S%H7200>nothing<s%>; you see my casting <S%H2866>down<s%>, and are <S%H3372>afraid<s%>.
Did I <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H3051>Bring<s%> unto <S%H7809>me<s%>? or, Give a reward for me of your <S%H3581>substance<s%>?
<S%H4422>Or<s%>, Deliver me from the <S%H6862>enemy<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand<s%>? <S%H6299>or<s%>, Redeem me from the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H6184>mighty<s%>?
<S%H3384>Teach<s%> <S%H2790>me<s%>, and I will hold my tongue: and cause me to <S%H995>understand<s%> where I have <S%H7686>erred<s%>.
How <S%H4834>forcible<s%> are <S%H3476>right<s%> <S%H561>words<s%>! but what does your <S%H3198>arguing<s%> <S%H3198>reprove<s%>?
Do you <S%H2803>imagine<s%> to <S%H3198>reprove<s%> <S%H4405>words<s%>, and the <S%H561>speeches<s%> of one that is <S%H2976>desperate<s%>, which are as <S%H7307>wind<s%>?
<S%H5307>Yes<s%>, you overwhelm the <S%H3490>fatherless<s%>, and you <S%H3738>dig<s%> a pit for your <S%H7453>friend<s%>.
Now therefore be <S%H2974>content<s%>, <S%H6437>look<s%> upon <S%H6440>me<s%>; for it is evident unto you if I <S%H3576>lie<s%>.
<S%H7725>Return<s%>, I pray <S%H5766>you<s%>, let it not be iniquity; <S%H7725>Yes<s%>, return again, my righteousness is in <S%H6664>it<s%>.
Is <S%H3426>there<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity<s%> in my <S%H3956>tongue<s%>? cannot my <S%H2441>taste<s%> <S%H995>discern<s%> perverse <S%H1942>things<s%>?
